ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From:  To:  Sent: Tuesday, February 25, 2003 11:11 AM Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where s Waldo in Shar
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: <edward001@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 25, 2003 11:11 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl


> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Biltilie Dwimmerlaik"
> <biltilie@m...> wrote:
> > > hopper. I'm having fun but I'm still looking for Registrar
> Bindarah.
> >
> > have a look at
> > http://www.eqatlas.com/luclin/sharvahluppermap.html
> >
> > i think she was at (16), inside a building. quite some time ago.
> >
> > - bilt
> >
> > --
> > Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
> Thank you very much. The map on page15 in the Everquest Shadow of
> Luclin Game Manual was confusing me. Usually North is at the top of
> the map instead of at the right hand side. G. I've located the maps
> now. How do I get into the crater and out of it without having to
> fall in and get killed to return tothe city? I'm starting my hunt for
> the three requested bare skinned rock hoppers.
>
> Edward
>
Oh, the maps that came with the game were some of my biggest pet peeves.
They made no sense to me. I asked /ooc if they looked even remotely like the
city (to people who had been exploring) and was told "No". And then they
sold that map booklet that is almost useless. Especially with some of the
errors. Like having A B C D E listed on the map but only A B C D defined. So
there's this zone that's marked but not defined... The person who did EQ
Atlas did a MUCH better job at maps. His maps are much much more useful. I
really wish he hadn't gotten screwed on the map book thingy. I would've
payed for a book with his maps over the one Sony put out. I still think it
would be cool if he made a book and had fold out maps and such. Ones that
are large enough to mark things on as notes to yourself. So you can look at
them ingame and out of game.
luv,
-Su
